description: Number of factorizations of n into distinct squarefree numbers > 1.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Dirichlet g.f.: prod{n is squarefree and > 1}(1+1/n^s).
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (subsequences, genericIndex)a050326 n = genericIndex a050326_list (n-1)a050326_list = 1 : f 2 where   f x = (if x /= s then a050326 s                    else length $ filter (== x) $ map product $                         subsequences $ tail $ a206778_row x) : f (x + 1)         where s = a046523 x-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 03 2013
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Oct 15 1999
